s-1.ptxt: REMOVE STEERING SLIDING WITH COUPLING YOKE SUB-ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Place matchmarks on the steering main shaft and yoke.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE NO. 2 STEERING INTERMEDIATE SHAFT SUB-ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Place matchmarks on the intermediate shaft and steering link.
Remove the bolt and intermediate shaft from the steering link.
Measure the length of the steering main shaft.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE KEY CYLINDER LIGHT ASSEMBLY (w/ Key Cylinder Light)

s2.ptxt: Using a screwdriver, widen the claw hanging onto the upper bracket by approximately 1.0 mm (0.039 in.).
Pull out the key cylinder light with the claw open.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE STEERING COLUMN UPPER WITH SWITCH BRACKET ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Using a 3 mm pin punch, mark the center of the 2 tapered-head bolts.
Using a 3 to 4 mm drill bit, drill into the 2 tapered-head bolts.
Using a screw extractor, remove the 2 bolts and bracket.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE IGNITION SWITCH LOCK CYLINDER ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Turn the ignition switch lock cylinder to the ACC position.
Push down the stop pin with a screwdriver and pull out the ignition switch lock cylinder.
Detach the 2 claws and remove the switch.
Detach the 2 claws and remove the switch from the steering column upper bracket.

s-1.ptxt: REMOVE KEY INTERLOCK SOLENOID (for Automatic Transmission)

s2.ptxt: Remove the 2 screws and solenoid from the steering column upper bracket.
Using a snap ring expander, remove the main shaft snap ring (outer side).
Using a brass bar and hammer, tap out the steering main shaft and steering main shaft bearing.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to drop the steering main shaft.

s2.ptxt: Using a snap ring expander, remove the steering main shaft snap ring (inner side).
